anyOf.title: Shared application State Loader.
anyOf.description: Set the application state using resolvables.

basePath.description: the base path of the url.
basePath.title: Base Path

host.description: Host that should be used when proxying the request
host.title: Host

isHref.description: if true so the path will be checked agaisnt the coming from request instead of using urlpattern.
isHref.title: Is Href

anyOf.title: Routes
anyOf.description: Used to configure your site routes

anyOf.title: Audience
anyOf.description: Select routes based on the matched audience.

anyOf.title: Audience Everyone
anyOf.description: Always match regardless of the current user

else.title: Otherwise
else.description: Used in case of none of the previous values are used.

required.description: Enforces the slot to be fulfilled.
required.title: Required

name.title: The audience name (will be used on cookies).
name.description: Add a meaningful short word for the audience name.
